subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Wilson Chandler is questionable for the Knicks’ final preseason game Friday against the Nets because of a sprained left knee. He is expected to be ready for the Oct. 29 season opener. Chandler was injured in Tuesday’s loss to the Celtics. A magnetic resonance imaging test Wednesday revealed a mild sprain, according to the Knicks. Chandler averaged 14 points and 8 rebounds in the first five preseason games. Coach Mike D’Antoni has used him as the first big man off the bench, primarily at power forward.
